message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $150. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $150 is the lowest I'm willing to go. This product is worth every penny of it. Let me know if you change your mind.
